root.str: Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Smoke Grenades can cause chaos and provide temporary cover to move through firefights
After a short lock-on period, Photon A2A missiles can be fired which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. VS use only.
Use any Shotgun to kill enemies as a Light Assault.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Option for the Passive system slot. Cloaked Infiltrators are automatically spotted when the vehicle comes within 10 meters of them. [WIP]
Killing enemy MAX units will restore 800 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>
The Mosquito is a the Terran Republic's one-man fighter. This aircraft the quickest and most agile of all the empire-specific fighters.
Increases resource gain by 30% and squad resource gain by 3% for 1 Day.
Reduces screen shake caused by explosions by 75%, and you are no longer affected by knockbacks caused by enemies or allies. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Kill bounty targets with a carbine.
Reduces damage taken from C4, Infantry Launchers, and Air to Ground Warheads by 20%.
When activated, the vehicle is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields and avoid damage when colliding with other vehicles.
Deploy Storm Buoys in any designated area
Adds 18 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rockets.
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 165 shield.
The Engineer can unlock an Anti-Vehicle Turret that deals high damage to vehicles at long range.
Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 10 meters, and while walking, you cannot be detected by recon devices at all.
Modeled after the popular 11A, the 11C carbine is a stable and accurate all-arounder, making it a great choice for engagements up to medium ranges. All factions can use NS weapons.
Apply the Digital camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
This type of generator provides power to the shields protecting the interior of the facility. If these shields fail, the most critical points of the base will be exposed to the enemy.
Apply the Carbon Fiber camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Can't move member. Squad is full.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rounds.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Next Rank: Further reduces damage taken from enemy fire, also reduces reuse cooldown timer from 36 to 33 seconds.
Weapon can be fired faster after sprinting. Lasts 1 hour. Rank 12 required.
Increases the Nano-Regen Device's recharge rate by 11%.
Reduces the amount of damage received from explosions by roughly 8%
Adds 1 round to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> When I was a little girl, grandmother would bring me keepsakes from the planet's surface. Interesting rocks, and glass containers full of dirt and sand. I miss those days.
Increases the top speed of the Sunderer by 4 KPH.
You must be the fresh meat they promised. Welcome to the war, recruit. Access the Holo Table to Join Combat, and we'll get you exactly where those boots are needed most.
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. You're going to want to come and see me on the Observation Deck in Sanctuary. It's time.
Apply the Scrub Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
The Solstice VE3's reliability and versatility have made it a popular choice of carbine.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 shells.
Woe be unto he, who does not heed the call of Liberty. NC use only.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the speed at which your shields recharge to full by 38%, and reduces the delay before your shield begins recharging by 1 second.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Well done, acolyte. You've shown that the ANT can do more than disintegrate ore. Once they were even used to transport resources across the battlefield to power bases. Such purpose. Delivering payment now.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 18%, and C-4 damage is reduced by 35%.

The Nano-Armor Kit repairs friendly vehicles, MAXes, equipment and can deconstruct enemy tank mines.

Hold Fire to repair and Aim to deconstruct.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Greenhorn Voice Pack. NC Male use only.
Automatically purchase this item when you are empty.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. Only usable by NC.
Most vehicles cannot be damaged by small arms fire.To deal with these threats use high explosive weaponry such as Rocket Launchers, C4, Anti-Tank Mines, or an Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret.
Allows cortium to be used to create an Anti-Vehicle Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players. TR only.
Increases the top speed of the Magrider by 4 KPH.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Features an advanced targeting system can lock-on to air and ground vehicles
Single Use Indar Canyons v1 Camo
Nanite based tool specialized to repair mechanical systems.
Apply the Diced camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
The Lightning is a fast light tank with a main cannon that can be configured for many roles.
You can also redploy back to a friendly facitliy using the redeploy mechanism. Redeploy has a 10 second countdown timer.
Facilities can only be captured if your empire has a Lattice link to that facility.
Battles are neither fought nor won from the Warpgate region. Use Join Combat "J" to travel to an active combat area.
The deploy location is too high
Earn this service ribbon by capturing facilities.

<font color="#7FF4FF">CERTIFICATIONS</font> allow you to <font color="#7FF4FF">SPECIALIZE</font> your classes, vehicles, and leadership abilities in addition to unlocking new <font color="#7FF4FF">WEAPONS</font>, <font color="#7FF4FF">EQUIPMENT</font>, and <font color="#7FF4FF">ATTACHMENTS</font>.
Ground Vehicles: Run over 100 infantry using a vehicle
Reduces the acquire timer of the Vanguard by 630 seconds.
Congratulations on winning the Creators Contest!
Adds 50 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the amount of Cortium harvested per second by 40%.
Apply the Tiger Stripe camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
The powerful LA7 Raven features lock-on technology capable of acquiring both air and ground based targets.
Dual Photon Pods fire a volley of up to 14 unguided, high-explosive photon rockets. VS use only.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 2.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Primary Left: Anti-Infantry-Vehicle: NS35 Frag Cannon
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 48 seconds.
A 12x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Press [%s] to speak with Second Lt.
NC: MAX: Defensive: Extra Ammo 1 Description
Increases the strength of Nanoweave Armor.
Hack enemy terminals or turrets as an Infiltrator
Constructs a fortified bunker with firing areas for infantry.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 10%.
Creep out your enemies with the Deathmarch Horn for your Harasser!
When placed modules can provide particular deployables within an area with benefits
Control an active Elysium Drill while it harvests.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.
Could not leave squad due to bad player group.

Headshot kills grant 50% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds; chaining headshots can store a maximum of 8 seconds worth of rechamber speed.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
This customization adds a Teal decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Apply the single use Arid Forest camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Allows use of the long range 6x BDS-6 scope.
艾美瑞什 Hearts Weapon Camo
Increases afterburner fuel capacity by 220%. NC use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 180 seconds.
Reduces the duration of Flash, Concussion, and EMP grenades used against you.
Increases the amount of resources gained by 50%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
You can also aim down the sights of your weapon by right-clicking on your mouse. This will greatly improve accuracy but penalize your movement.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 788 rounds.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Damaging enemies now automatically spots them for you and allies, while kills from greater than 50 meters will clear spot checks on you and prevent new ones from being applied for one second. Headshots now also apply this effect at any range.<font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
VS: Vehicle - Customization - PS2 Badge Promo
Gathering valuable resources is only half of the challenge. Moving these resources can also prove difficult. Help Nascent Expeditions deliver their shipment by completing a Payload alert.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> One of our agents was able to get into the Bio Lab but was unkindly escorted off the premises before they could find the document.
Allows use of a forward grip. Forward grips increase the user's control of the weapon, reducing horizontal recoil.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 30 ms.

Finishing a reload or receiving fall damage will increase your sprint speed by 20%, your jump height significantly, and allow you to enter sprint almost instantly, for the next 1.5 seconds. Firing your weapon ends this effect early.
Flak Armor provides improved protection from nearby explosions.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum duration the shield can remain active to 13.5 seconds.

Unlocks the Lightning Grenade for this character. Lightning Grenades are resupplied using Nanites. When this sticky grenade is thrown, it will create the conditions for a lightning strike at its location.

Takes 6 seconds for a bolt to manifest.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
[*source*] has invited you to join the outfit, [*guild*].
Adds cosmetic plating to your Liberator. All factions can use this gear.
Outfit: Get 5 certifications for your outfit

This helmet only materializes during the Halloween Event, providing a spooky 10% XP boost while worn. Once the event comes to a grisly end, this item vanishes into the abyss from whence it spawned until next Halloween!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 304 rounds.
Kill a bounty target with an assault rifle.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Earn points by holding Iron Quay, SRP Hydroponics, VEX Biologics, or Nason's Defiance.

Contains Arbiter Armor for all non-MAX infantry classes.

Standing still for 1 second provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 75 rounds.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 1 day. Boost can only be used on this character.
Your faction's victory has yielded a 20% aircraft discount on Indar!

Thank you for being a Loyal Member!

Extended magazine certification for the Harasser based Mjolnir has been refunded. It has been replaced with a two-rank version.

You automatically repair 8% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.

Detects the movement of hostile soldiers within 50 meters of the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all vehicle occupants.
Reloads your currently equipped weapon. Many weapons reload faster if there are still rounds left in the magazine.

Every friendly facility has a protected spawn room where you can prepare before moving out.
Increases the rotation speed of the Lightning by 25 degrees/second.
Weapons in the carbine family are issued to Light Assaults and Engineers.
When activated, the Flash is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields. Lasts 14 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.

One does not simply walk into an enemy base. Flank enemies using routes they won't expect!

Activate to disrupt lock-on attempts and missiles tracking the vehicle for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 35 seconds.
Press "Q" (default) to spot enemies. Spotted enemies will reveal their location on the minimap to you and your allies, and mark them for visibility.

Generates a decaying shield of nanites 6 meters around the soldier that mitigates 25% damage to nearby allies for up to 6.25 seconds. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly.

NC Heavy Assault Ability. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
This customization adds a Tan decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Reduces NMG's full recharge time to 28 seconds.
With its larger magazine and cone of fire, the M20 Kestrel allows Reaver pilots to be less accurate with their shots and still be able to land hits. NC Use Only. NC use only.

A grenade capable of detecting enemy troops within a radius, including infiltrators
Allows cortium to be used to create a spire that will damage enemy infantry and MAX within 15 meters of the spire. All Factions can use this item.

<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, PapaVanu4U. Download currently 60% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
Destroy enemy vehicles with the NSX Masamune.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Something is happening with the Rebirthing Matrix and no one seems to be paying attention! You there, whoever you are, use your Medical Applicator to heal and revive your allies so I can monitor the impact on the matrix. I'll compensate you for your time.
Applies a camo to your weapon. TR use only.
Awarded for mastery of the Javelin, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a glowing endorsement of the owner's support vehicle accomplishments.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
While piloting a vehicle with open seats, listen for transport requests. Find the player who made the request by looking for a steering wheel icon above their head and on the minimap.

Used to craft War Assets in the Outfit Armory.
The objective is to take the control node.
Hello operative. Let's discuss your next mission.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
The Deca is well regarded among sharpshooters due to its ability to line up long range shots that most other scopes would find daunting.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> That leaves you with two options. The boring one is to take your vehicle around the river to one of the shallow crossings. Or you can jump the damaged bridge.
This 6x thermal optic highlights enemy infantry and vehicles, allowing target differentiation even through smoke or in darkness.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.

Increase the Prowler's main cannon reload speed for a short time.
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 80 meters the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Zealot Voice Pack. VS Male use only.

This platinum MKV has an integrated suppressor that prevents the user from showing on the minimap when firing. It features superior bullet velocity and long range stopping power compared to SMGs using optional aftermarket suppressors. All factions can use NS weapons.
The powerful bolt-action SR-7 is capable of eliminating targets from extremely long distances. TR use only.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership at this time.

Allows the Infiltrator to use EMP grenades. EMP Grenades create a blast that can go through walls and destroy most enemy deployables. Soldiers directly caught in the blast will also have their personal shields and HUD disabled for a few seconds.
